sentences.sContent: Alan heaved his suitcase onto his bed.
sentences.sCn: 艾伦把他的手提箱拖到床上。

sentences.sContent: John heaved the metal bar over the fence.
sentences.sCn: 约翰把金属棒扔过了篱笆。

synos.tran: 举起；使起伏；投掷；恶心；发出（叹息等）
举起；起伏；投掷；一阵呕吐

remMethod.val: 董存瑞举起(heave)炸药包， 直到爆炸也没离开(leave)

words.tran: 挑夫，[机] 杠杆；举起物件的装置；举起者

trans.tranOther: to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort
